answerText: Mexico[10] Juan Preciado journeys to the ghost town of Comala in this Mexican author's Pedro Paramo.  He collected such short stories as "We're very poor" and "Tell Them Not to Kill Me!" in The Burning Plain.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 12 | 2 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One author from this country drew from an interview with Jesusa Palancares for her novel Hasta no Verte, Jesus Mio. For 10 points each:  [10] Name this country home to Elena Poniatowska. Another author from this country wrote a recent novel narrated by the decapitated head of Josue Nadal, entitled Destiny and Desire.
